scripts.install: cd frontend && yarn install && cd - && rm -fR node_modules && go mod tidy && yarn build
scripts.lint: cd frontend && yarn eslint .  --max-warnings=0 && cd .. && golangci-lint run
scripts.test-go-detail: echo 'detailed testing may take 30 seconds...' ; cd ./pkg/types ; go test -tags=detailed ./... ; cd -
scripts.test-tsx: cd frontend && yarn vitest run && cd ..
scripts.test: export $(grep -v '^#' ./.env | xargs) >/dev/null && yarn test-go && yarn test-tsx && yarn test-dalle
